title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.19 - Assurance, maintenance of effort-part b
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.19 - Assurance, maintenance of effort-part b

State Regulations

The State educational agency assures that the aggregate
amount to be expended per student or the aggregate expenditure by the State, its local educational agencies, and private schools in the State from funds
derived from non-Federal sources for programs described in section 421(a) of

The Elementary and Secondary Education Act for the preceding fiscal year were
not less than the amount per student or the aggregate expenditure for the
second preceding year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2302.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
